text.div:
Mumps (Tests for mumps virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    47532-7 Mumps virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    53603-7 Mumps virus RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    7968-1 Mumps virus RNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    85800-1 Mumps virus SH gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    85807-6 Mumps virus genotype in Unspecified specimen
    86580-8 Mumps virus RNA [Presence] in Urine by NAA with probe detection
    91806-0 Mumps virus RNA [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
